# Government Tender Announcement

## Refrigeration Services
### Government of Canada Wants Your Bid on Industrial Refrigeration Services

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is inviting sealed bids from qualified contractors to provide industrial refrigeration services at the Morden Research and Development Centre in Manitoba.

## Key Details

* **Tender Notice Reference Number:** cb-6467-24757797
* **Tender Title:** Refrigeration Services
* **Proposal Closing Date:** August 9, 2023, at 1:00 PM CDT
* **Contract Period:** One year with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods
* **Security Requirements:** Bidder personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by AAFC
* **Technical Requirements:** Bids must comply with the entire requirement of the bid solicitation including the technical and financial evaluation criteria
* **Contract Price:** The lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract
* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
* **Intellectual Property:** Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement

## About the Tender

The objective of this request for proposal is to establish a contract with task authorizations for the delivery of refrigeration services to the Morden Research and Development Centre in Morden, Manitoba. The contract will be for a period of one year, with options to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The tender notice can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/solicitation-opportunities. Canada is not responsible for information found on third-party websites. It is the sole responsibility of the Bidder to regularly consult GETS for the most up-to-date information.

## Register Opportunity
Create a profile in the federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to increase your company’s visibility and compete for federal government contracts set aside for Indigenous businesses.

**Interested contractors can submit responses by August 9th**. For further information, please reference the tender documents at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6467/01r11-24-c008-refrigeration-rfp.pdf

 Should you have any questions or require additional information about this tender, contact **Camille Sobczak** at **(204) 430-5426**
